parameters.description: The parent name (e.g., domain) under which the label will be minted.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: The label or subname to be minted under the parent name.

parameters.name: isTestnet
parameters.description: Indicates whether the operation is on a sepolia testnet.

200.description: Estimated price, fee, and validation status for requested subname.

get.summary: Get estimated minting parameters and validation results

requestBody.description: Mint request including label, parent name, minter address, etc.

200.description: Signed mint parameters ready to be used on-chain.

post.summary: Generate mint parameters and return a signed payload

info.title: Namespace: Minting Manager
info.description: Microservice that knows all about minting.

canMint.description: Indicates if the subname can be minted.

estimatedPriceEth.description: Estimated price in ETH for the minting operation.

isStandardFee.description: Indicates whether the estimated fee is a standard fixed fee.

validationErrors.description: List of validation error types if minting is not allowed.

label.description: Label or subname to mint (e.g., "satoshi"). Must be 1-255 characters.

parentName.description: Parent ENS name under which the label is being minted (e.g., "universe.eth").

expiryInYears.description: Optional number of years the subname will be valid for. Used for expirable names. Defaults to 1 if not provided

isTestnet.description: Whether the operation is being performed on a testnet.

owner.description: Optional custom owner address of the subname (if different from minter).

label.description: Subname to mint, provided in the request.

owner.description: Owner of the subname to be minted.

fee.description: Fee charged by the platform to mint the requested subname (in ETH, as a string).

price.description: Price to mint the requested subname (in ETH, as a string).

parentNode.description: Namehash of the parent ENS name under which the subname is being minted.

paymentReceiver.description: Recipient of the payment. Defaults to the owner of the listing.

verifiedMinter.description: Address that is authorized as a verified minter. Set if the listing requires one.

signatureExpiry.description: Unix timestamp of when the minting signature will expire.

expiry.description: Unix timestamp of when the subname will expire. Defaults to max integer or follows parent name expiry.

fuses.description: Optional ENS fuses value (bitmask representing restrictions).

content.description: The structured mint parameters used for generating the signature.

signature.description: Cryptographic signature of the mint parameters.
